content.description: Difficult, mostly 7-8-inch off-width grunt-fest. Crux opening move at flaring bottom. Beware some of the low chockstones are somewhat loose. Good small-to-medium size gear in upper half. Walk-off descent (climber's left).
content.protection: 2-3 Big Bros (#4), 1 6" cam, small and medium cams for upper section. Slings for chockstones. Sling tree for anchor.Â
content.location: Left end of Waking Dream Wall. Obvious off-width.

content.description: Nice zig-zag route following an easy ramp to face moves and a crux overhung corner.
content.protection: Standard rack, including micro cams. Sling tree for anchor. Walk-off descent (climber's left).
content.location: 100 feet right of Short, Wide, and Handsome. 30 feet left of Ladybug Jam.

content.description: Fun flaring hand-crack system by an arete that leads to a scenic face and airy bulge. Runout but easy slab topout. Be careful with a potentially loose jug and flake to the left of the last bolt. Walk-off descent to left or right (right more complicated). Ladybugs filled the crack on the first ascent.
content.protection: 2 bolts on face. Standard rack. Sling tree for anchor after slab top-out.

content.description: Excellent overlooked south-facing crag below Wall that Dreams Are Made Of.
